Key Match Events: Shubman Gill hit a six in the first over
Suryakumar Yadav was run out for 0
Tilak Varma hit a four off a full-length ball
Shimron Hetmyer took a sharp catch at deep point
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya said they will bat first as the wicket looks nice and they want to put runs on the board
Rovman Powell mentioned that they did not lose wickets in clusters and bowled as a unit as well
Post-Match Reflections: Rovman Powell said they are sticking to the same side
Hardik Pandya said they have a forced change with Kuldeep Yadav injuring himself in the nets and Ravi Bishnoi comes in to replace him
Miscellaneous Highlights: The hosts have the momentum on their side coming into this game
India have ample of talent in their squad, and it won't be surprising even they are able to win four on the bounce from hereon
